Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)
Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: iv adj : being one more than three [syn: {four}, {4}] n 1: the cardinal number that is the sum of three and one [syn: {four}, {4}, {tetrad}, {quatern}, {quaternion}, {quaternary}, {quaternity}, {quartet}, {quadruplet}, {foursome}, {Little Joe}] 2: administration of nutrients through a vein [syn: {intravenous feeding}]
